verses.roman:
saba ṭhākurāṇī mahāprabhuke bhikṣā dite
prabhura nānā priya dravya nila ghara haite

synonyms: saba ṭhākurāṇī—all the wives of the great devotees; mahāprabhuke—to Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; bhikṣā dite—to offer food; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nānā—various; priya dravya—pleasing foods; nila—took; ghara haite—from home.
translation: To offer Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu various types of food, all the wives of the great devotees brought from home various things that pleased Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
